targets.queryText: SELECT period_start_date || ' -> ' || period_end_date AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='MONTH' AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT period_start_date || ' -> ' || period_end_date AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='MONTH' AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT mv_delta AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='MONTH' AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT mv_delta AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='MONTH' AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT monthly_income_delta AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='MONTH' AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT monthly_income_delta AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='MONTH' AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT twr_period_pct AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='MONTH' AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT twr_period_pct AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='MONTH' AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT days_exceeding_var_95 AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='MONTH' AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT days_exceeding_var_95 AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='MONTH' AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT margin_call_events AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='MONTH' AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT margin_call_events AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='MONTH' AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: WITH p AS (SELECT period_type, period_start_date, period_end_date FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='MONTH' AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT i.interval_label, i.interval_start, i.interval_end, i.mv, i.monthly_income, i.vol_30d_pct, i.var_95_1d_pct, i.cvar_90_1d_pct, i.goal_progress_pct FROM period_intervals i JOIN p ON i.period_type=p.period_type AND i.period_start_date=p.period_start_date AND i.period_end_date=p.period_end_date ORDER BY i.interval_label DESC;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH p AS (SELECT period_type, period_start_date, period_end_date FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='MONTH' AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT i.interval_label, i.interval_start, i.interval_end, i.mv, i.monthly_income, i.vol_30d_pct, i.var_95_1d_pct, i.cvar_90_1d_pct, i.goal_progress_pct FROM period_intervals i JOIN p ON i.period_type=p.period_type AND i.period_start_date=p.period_start_date AND i.period_end_date=p.period_end_date ORDER BY i.interval_label DESC;

targets.queryText: WITH p AS (SELECT period_type, period_start_date, period_end_date FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='MONTH' AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1), il AS (SELECT i.interval_label FROM period_intervals i JOIN p ON i.period_type=p.period_type AND i.period_start_date=p.period_start_date AND i.period_end_date=p.period_end_date ORDER BY i.interval_label DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT h.symbol, h.weight_pct, h.market_value, h.pnl_dollar, h.current_yield_pct, h.risk_quality_category FROM period_interval_holdings h JOIN p ON h.period_type=p.period_type AND h.period_start_date=p.period_start_date AND h.period_end_date=p.period_end_date JOIN il ON h.interval_label=il.interval_label ORDER BY h.weight_pct DESC;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH p AS (SELECT period_type, period_start_date, period_end_date FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='MONTH' AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1), il AS (SELECT i.interval_label FROM period_intervals i JOIN p ON i.period_type=p.period_type AND i.period_start_date=p.period_start_date AND i.period_end_date=p.period_end_date ORDER BY i.interval_label DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT h.symbol, h.weight_pct, h.market_value, h.pnl_dollar, h.current_yield_pct, h.risk_quality_category FROM period_interval_holdings h JOIN p ON h.period_type=p.period_type AND h.period_start_date=p.period_start_date AND h.period_end_date=p.period_end_date JOIN il ON h.interval_label=il.interval_label ORDER BY h.weight_pct DESC;

targets.queryText: WITH p AS (SELECT period_type, period_start_date, period_end_date FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='MONTH' AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1), il AS (SELECT i.interval_label FROM period_intervals i JOIN p ON i.period_type=p.period_type AND i.period_start_date=p.period_start_date AND i.period_end_date=p.period_end_date ORDER BY i.interval_label DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT a.window, a.total_return_pct FROM period_interval_attribution a JOIN p ON a.period_type=p.period_type AND a.period_start_date=p.period_start_date AND a.period_end_date=p.period_end_date JOIN il ON a.interval_label=il.interval_label ORDER BY CASE a.window WHEN '1m' THEN 1 WHEN '3m' THEN 2 WHEN '6m' THEN 3 WHEN '12m' THEN 4 ELSE 9 END;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH p AS (SELECT period_type, period_start_date, period_end_date FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='MONTH' AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1), il AS (SELECT i.interval_label FROM period_intervals i JOIN p ON i.period_type=p.period_type AND i.period_start_date=p.period_start_date AND i.period_end_date=p.period_end_date ORDER BY i.interval_label DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT a.window, a.total_return_pct FROM period_interval_attribution a JOIN p ON a.period_type=p.period_type AND a.period_start_date=p.period_start_date AND a.period_end_date=p.period_end_date JOIN il ON a.interval_label=il.interval_label ORDER BY CASE a.window WHEN '1m' THEN 1 WHEN '3m' THEN 2 WHEN '6m' THEN 3 WHEN '12m' THEN 4 ELSE 9 END;

targets.queryText: SELECT (period_end_date || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, period_max_drawdown_pct AS "Max DD %", margin_call_events AS "Margin Call Events", days_exceeding_var_95 AS "VaR95 Breach Days" FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' AND is_rolling=0 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 12;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT (period_end_date || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, period_max_drawdown_pct AS "Max DD %", margin_call_events AS "Margin Call Events", days_exceeding_var_95 AS "VaR95 Breach Days" FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='WEEK' AND is_rolling=0 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 12;
